title: Which scatter plots shows strongest relation

content.question: Which of the following scatterplots shows the strongest relationship between the variables of narcissistic personality disorder and conscientiousness?

choices.label: The figure presents a scatterplot consisting of 15 points. Beginning near the origin, the points move upward and to the right in a band like fashion. The dots are packed moderately close together.
The figure presents a scatterplot consisting of 15 points. Beginning near the origin, the points move somewhat upward and to the right. The dots are neither closely packed nor spread evenly.
The figure presents a scatterplot consisting of 15 points. The points are spread out relatively evenly in the center of the scatterplot, in a somewhat circular fashion.

The figure presents a scatterplot consisting of 15 points. Beginning at the top of the vertical axis, the points move downward and to the right in a band like fashion. The dots are very closely packed together.

content.answer: The figure presents a scatterplot consisting of 15 points. Beginning at the top of the vertical axis, the points move downward and to the right in a band like fashion. The dots are very closely packed together.

topic.text: 5.4: Selection of Categories of Psychological Disorders

skill.text: 3.C: Interpret quantitative or qualitative inferential data from a given table, graph, chart, figure, or diagram.
